entries.title: Walmart Receipt Template Guide
entries.meta_description: Learn how to customize and generate professional Walmart-style receipts quickly.
entries.intro: Use this page format for scalable programmatic SEO pages.
intro_paragraphs: Use this page format for scalable programmatic SEO pages.
entries.body: Add your store-specific copy, then run the generator to publish at scale.
body_paragraphs: Add your store-specific copy, then run the generator to publish at scale.

faq.question: Can I create 100+ pages from one sheet?
faq.answer: Yes. Add rows and rerun the generator.

faq.question: Does this replace hardcoded routes?
faq.answer: Yes, new rows become available through dynamic routing.

entries.title: Walmart Receipt Generator Tool
entries.meta_description: Generate Walmart-style receipts online with editable fields and instant PDF export.
entries.intro: Tool pages can point users to existing receipt generators.
intro_paragraphs: Tool pages can point users to existing receipt generators.
entries.body: Use this entry type to scale tool landing pages from the same sheet.
body_paragraphs: Use this entry type to scale tool landing pages from the same sheet.

faq.question: How does tool routing work?
faq.answer: Set route_path in the sheet and it becomes live after generation.
